basic.description: This course is a survey of modern biochemistry with special emphasis on those concepts which might be of use to nutrition and food scientists.
basic.subject: BCH
basic.title: Introduction to Biochemistry

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisites: CHM 2200 and CHM 2200L both with a grades of "C-" or better, or CHM 2211 and CHM 2211L both with grades of "C-" or better.
